_metadata.description: Thermal Interface Materials Expansion - 30 materials for AI chip cooling, data centers, electronics thermal management

Arctic_MX6.name: Arctic MX-6 Thermal Paste
Arctic_MX6.notes: Carbon microparticles, non-conductive, CPU/GPU, 8 years shelf life

Noctua_NT_H2.name: Noctua NT-H2
Noctua_NT_H2.notes: Low viscosity, easy application, non-conductive, 3 years shelf life

Thermal_Grizzly_Kryonaut.name: Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut
Thermal_Grizzly_Kryonaut.notes: Aluminum oxide particles, overclocking, LN2 capable, best non-metal paste

Gelid_GC_Extreme.name: Gelid GC-Extreme
Gelid_GC_Extreme.notes: Silver compound, non-curing, easy removal, 5 years shelf life

Cooler_Master_MasterGel_Maker.name: Cooler Master MasterGel Maker
Cooler_Master_MasterGel_Maker.notes: Nano-diamond particles, high-end CPUs, low viscosity spreads

Liquid_Metal_Conductonaut.name: Thermal Grizzly Conductonaut
Liquid_Metal_Conductonaut.notes: Ga-In-Sn eutectic, highest conductivity, conductive (not for Al), delidding

Liquid_Metal_Galinstan.name: Galinstan
Liquid_Metal_Galinstan.notes: 68.5% Ga, 21.5% In, 10% Sn, liquid at room temp, non-toxic Hg replacement

Liquid_Metal_EGaIn.name: EGaIn
Liquid_Metal_EGaIn.notes: 75% Ga, 25% In eutectic, flexible electronics, soft robotics, thermal switches

Indium_Foil.name: Indium Foil
Indium_Foil.notes: Pure indium, conforms under pressure, cryogenics, vacuum seals

Graphite_Pad.name: Graphite Thermal Pad
Graphite_Pad.notes: Anisotropic graphite sheet, reusable, dry, GPUs, PS5 console

Laird_Tpli_220.name: Laird Tflex 220
Laird_Tpli_220.notes: Gap filler, conformable, EMI shielding version available

PCM_Honeywell.name: Honeywell PCM Phase Change Material
PCM_Honeywell.notes: Solid at room temp, flows at 58°C, CPUs, minimal pump-out

Indium_TIM.name: Indium Corporation Thermal Interface Material
Indium_TIM.notes: Indium-based, high-power semiconductors, thermal cycling resistant

Paraffin_Wax_PCM.name: Paraffin Wax RT58
Paraffin_Wax_PCM.notes: Organic PCM, passive cooling, battery thermal management, low cost

Salt_Hydrate_PCM.name: Sodium Sulfate Decahydrate
Salt_Hydrate_PCM.notes: Na2SO4·10H2O, Glauber's salt, high latent heat, building HVAC

Metallic_PCM_BiSnInCd.name: Bi-Sn-In-Cd Eutectic
Metallic_PCM_BiSnInCd.notes: Field's metal variant, high conductivity PCM, electronics thermal buffering

Boron_Nitride_Paste.name: Boron Nitride Thermal Paste
Boron_Nitride_Paste.notes: h-BN, electrically insulating, ultra-high temp, power electronics

Diamond_Compound.name: Synthetic Diamond Thermal Compound
Diamond_Compound.notes: Micronized diamond particles, extreme overclocking, long-term stability

Silver_Compound.name: Silver Thermal Compound
Silver_Compound.notes: Ag particles in silicone, non-conductive despite metal, traditional choice

Ceramic_Compound.name: Ceramic Thermal Compound
Ceramic_Compound.notes: ZnO/Al2O3, non-conductive, budget option, pre-applied on stock coolers

Thermal_Adhesive_Arctic.name: Arctic Thermal Adhesive
Thermal_Adhesive_Arctic.notes: Epoxy-based, permanent bonding, heatsink attachment, 4-hour cure

Thermal_Epoxy_Omegabond.name: Omegabond 101 Thermal Epoxy
Thermal_Epoxy_Omegabond.notes: Two-part epoxy, high-temp electronics, structural + thermal

Graphene_Thermal_Paste.name: Graphene-Enhanced Thermal Paste
Graphene_Thermal_Paste.notes: Graphene nanoplatelets, emerging tech, non-conductive, stable

Liquid_Metal_Thermal_Pad.name: Honeywell PTM7958
Liquid_Metal_Thermal_Pad.notes: Solid pad, transitions to paste-like at 60°C, PS5, laptops, no pump-out

Copper_Shim.name: Copper Thermal Shim
Copper_Shim.notes: Solid copper, highest conductivity, GPU memory, requires TIM on both sides

Aluminum_Nitride_Paste.name: Aluminum Nitride Thermal Paste
Aluminum_Nitride_Paste.notes: AlN particles, ultra-high conductivity, electrically insulating, power modules

Carbon_Nanotube_TIM.name: Carbon Nanotube Thermal Interface Material
Carbon_Nanotube_TIM.notes: Vertically aligned CNTs, research/prototype, low contact resistance
